ChunkText: additional information it is important to note that extensions may be requested for any duration that your academic advisor deems necessary to complete your program. in addition, the required financial documentation must demonstrate the necessary support from your financial sponsor for the additional duration of the program.
ContextBefore: complete all sections of the application as per the directions provided. ensure that you obtain electronic support from your academic advisor as indicated in the recommendations section. after uploading all necessary requirements, click submit. isss advisors will review your application and contact you after receiving your advisors recommendation.
ContextAfter: graduate assistants may submit a short letter of continued support from their ga supervisor or a new contract as acceptable documentation.
